featured.text: We are not blank hard drives waiting to be filled with data.
Why did the architect send Jack a blank check? (A)
One oil company offered him $2000 for his help and an architect even sent him a blank check.

definition.zh_def: 空白的；未填寫的；無內容的
definition.en_def: Empty or containing nothing; a space where something is missing.
definition.example: She handed me a blank piece of paper.
